title: Shift in Time
description: True love’s first kiss will not break a curse.Everyone knows that. Even a Normal like Morgan Monstros knows that.But Fane Llewellyn isn’t everyone. He’s like no one Morgan has ever met.Small, fragile and fierce, Fane doesn’t remember who he is or where he came from. He remembers pain and loneliness. Decades of pain and loneliness. And Morgan Monstros. He could never forget Gan. Gan was his from the day he came to the island. And Fane would fight to the death to keep Morgan safe. Even if he has to fight the whole world to do it.Take one powerless witch, a sassy Siamese familiar, a panther shifter with amnesia, a meddling wolf clan, and a coven of witches hell bent on war, swirl all together and you get the perfect spell for all out mayhem…..oh yeah and there’s chocolate cake too.
author: Mercy Celeste
